properties.name: Apertivo
properties.description: Posted by Sdman79 3926 30th St, san diego, caExcellent Italian tapas restaurant and wine bar. Delicious, reasonably priced dishes and friendly service.

properties.name: Baja Betty's
properties.description: Posted by Sdman79  1421 University Ave, San Diego, CAA casual bar and Mexican restaurant with a good happy hour during the week and buffet brunch (bottomless mimosas!) on the weekends.

properties.name: Bourbon Street
properties.description: Posted by Sdman79 4612 Park Blvd, San Diego, CAEveryone goes to Bourbon Street. This fairly friendly University Heights bar pulls in big crowds on Friday and Saturday nights. Up to four different bar areas are open, two inside and two outside, depending on the night.

properties.name: Claire de Lune Coffee Lounge
properties.description: Posted by Sdman79  2906 University Ave, San Diego, CAVery laid back coffee house (serving some food, too) with great drinks and an all-inclusive atmosphere. Popular with everyone. Live music some nights. Has indoor seating with an elevated study area, as well as outdoor seating with "misters" for hot days.

properties.name: Flicks
properties.description: Posted by Sdman79 1017 University Ave, San Diego, CAA good, centrally located, stand-and-pose kind of bar. Lots of plasma TV screens. Has one main bar, and a smaller second for busy nights, as well as a pool table, a couple arcade games, and a smoking patio. Very popular on Wednesdays.

properties.name: Hamburger Mary's
properties.description: Posted by Sdman79  308 University Ave, San Diego, CAA relaxed, low-attitude restaurant and bar. Features one outdoor and two indoor bars with a good-sized dance floor. Country Western (called "Kickers") is the theme most nights, except Sundays ("Club Detour"), which play the typical, thumping club music. Popular all day on Sundays.

properties.name: India Palace
properties.description: Posted by Sdman79 694 University Ave, San Diego, CA

properties.name: Kitima Thai Cuisine
properties.description: Posted by Sdman79 406 University Ave, San Diego, CAThere\'s no shortage of Thai in Hillcrest, but many consider this the best. Great food, nice atmosphere, OK prices. Live jazz some nights.

properties.name: Redwing
properties.description: Posted by Sdman79 4012 30th St, San Diego, CALocal dive bar with cheap, strong drinks and an allergy to attitude. Friendly staff. Has a pool table and a smoking patio out back.

properties.name: Rich's
properties.description: Posted by Sdman79  1051 University Ave Ste 258, San Diego, CAArguably the most popular gay club in San Diego. Has a relatively small bar area in the front, with a few pool tables, and a very large dance floor area in the back, with another bar. Sometimes pulls in well-known DJs. Very busy Friday, Saturday, and Sunday nights.

properties.name: Urban Grind
properties.description: Posted by Transfairusa 3799 Park Blvd, SAN DIEGO, CA, 92103-3640fair trade
